body.p: Management commentary should provide information to help users of the financial reports to assess the performance of the entity and the actions of its management relative to stated strategies and plans for progress. That type of commentary will help users of the financial reports to understand, for example:

li.p: the entity’s risk exposures, its strategies for managing risks and the effectiveness of those strategies;
how resources that are not presented in the financial statements could affect the entity’s operations; and
how non‑financial factors have influenced the information presented in the financial statements.
